Id.description: Unique identifier for the element, uuidv7 format

Supertype.description: The supertype category to which the element belongs.

Subtype.description: The subtype category under which the element is further classified.

Image_URL.description: URL to an image representing the element.

aesthetics.description: Visual and design characteristics of the object.

weight.description: Physical weight of the object, usually in kilograms or pounds.

amount.description: Quantity or count of the object, particularly if it is part of a set or collection.

parent_object.description: Directly related or parent object from which this one is derived or part of.

technology.description: Technological aspects or mechanisms incorporated within the object.

utility.description: Primary function or use of the object.

effects.description: Effects or outcomes produced by the object when used.

enables.description: Abilities or actions enabled by using the object.

consumes.description: Resources or materials consumed by the object during use.

origins.description: Origins or historical background of the object.

location.description: Current location or usual storage place of the object.

craftsmanship.description: Quality of workmanship or level of craftsmanship of the object.

requirements.description: Conditions or prerequisites required to use the object effectively.

durability.description: Measure of the object's resistance to wear and damage.

value.description: Monetary or trade value of the object.

damage.description: Potential damage the object can inflict, applicable if used as a weapon.

armor.description: Armor rating, applicable if the object provides protection.

rarity.description: Scarcity or uniqueness of the object.

language.description: Language associated with or required to understand the object.

requires.description: Specific traits or skills required to use the object.
